name: Official Robert Jordan's "The Wheel of Time" Games Launch
blurb: Robert Jordan\u2019s epic "The Wheel of Time" realized in new digital games and apps. Join our initiative! \u201c'Drive the Wheel\u201d

rewards.reward: Our goal is full participation. Join us as a "Wheel of Time" fan and we will send you a personal, numbered, digital letter thanking you for your support of our opening title, "First Banner of the Rising Sun".

Answer the King of Cairhein"s "Call to Arms!".  Receive a Royal Decree of War thanking all loyal subjects for their support in the coming days of conflict; printed on fine paper and suitable for framing.

In addition to all of the above, we want to share the excitement by offering you first choice of your handle and early access to the information and social blog at our website. You will receive a code to access the site in advance.

You will also receive Official REG WoT wallpaper for the Aiel War and

$5 Game Currency

Your website gamer ID will sport the exclusive Ta'veren Emblem in recognition of your influence on The Pattern. In addition, you will receive all previous rewards and level up faster with a x2 Experience Boost for 24 hrs.\r\n\r\nHave fun with another $10 in Game Currency

Help us "Drive" the Wheel and receive all of the above plus, as part of our indie initiative, REG is developing a unique acoustic signature for the Aiel War and you will receive the Game Soundtrack.\r\n"Drivers" at this level will experience an exclusive side quest with a special skill upgrade.\r\nLevel up with another $10 Game Currency award ($25 total).

"Drivers" at this level wear the\r\nofficial, Limited Edition "Aiel War" T-Shirt, featuring the Ta'veren Emblem (its so cool we want one too!).\r\nThe iconic WoT digital print from famed production designer, artist and director Patrick Tatopolous will be included in poster format at this package level. To distinguish yourself in-game, you will gain access to a piece of equipment from the exclusive Manetheren item set, available only to "Drivers."

In addition to all the cool stuff above, add the Red Eagle Banner above your gamer ID for recognition. These "Drivers" will follow the game on the exclusive Commanders Map of the Aiel War Campaign, printed on fabric.\r\nAs a further thanks, the Art Team will sign the official game poster:\r\nAND... just to add more fun you get another $50 in game currency

Find your ta'veren influence in game with a Non-Player place, person, item or unique skill, created in your name, Jordanized for the game. Become a part of the development team and receive a piece of conceptual art used to create the game signed by the artists and suitable for framing (it will be a surprise but very cool). In addition,you get all of the mounting war chest of collectables.

Become immortalized in the game.  For those who want more game impact, instead of an in-game object, we will create a Non Player Character (NPC) in the Aiel War styled after your likeness. Your name will appear in the game credits with "Special Thanks" from the team and, to top this reward, the Art Team will create an original Poster of YOUR CHARACTER IN THE GAME. You get it all plus something we think is special, \r\na Lithograph of the Patrick Tatopoulos WoT digital art.

At this level, REG will match your enthusiasm with everything we have to offer... and then it gets even better.

In addition to the coolest T-shirt, REG will create a Custom WoT Driver Polo Shirt with Aiel War logos and the Ta'veren Emblem. Then, instead of the NPC place or item, in celebration of your ta'veren nature, we will model an in-game Recruitable Charcter with your likeness. You will be welcomed as an advisory member of the game team in a private digital session and receive credit as a Character Consultant. The Art Team will customize your character poster and send you a signed print.

In celebration, join us to meet and lunch with the Design Team at our studios and stay for the launch party that night (travel not included)
